name: TALKTOME
description:
Match your partner's facial expressions by mixing and finding it on your trackpad.

Another day, another never ending round of meetings. Constant Anxiety doesn't help, but you must get it together to match the mood and face of your calling partner.

Controller supported.

  • Music by: https://soundcloud.com/alexandr-zhelanov
  • Correct Sound by: https://opengameart.org/content/point-bell
  • Failure Sound by: https://opengameart.org/content/crash-collision
  • Phone Ringing by: https://opengameart.org/content/crank-movie-telephone-ringtone
  • Bleep Sound by: https://opengameart.org/content/4-sci-fi-menu-sounds
  • Icons by https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/film-projector.html

Any feedback is appreciated!
